scripts.init-start: npm install concurrently && npm run init && npm run start:dev
scripts.init: concurrently -n client-init,server-init -c green.bold,blue.bold "npm run client:init" "npm run server:init"
scripts.init:force: concurrently -n client-init,server-init -c green.bold,blue.bold "npm run client:init --force" "npm run server:init --force"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently -n client,server -c green.bold,blue.bold "npm run dev" "nodemon server/server.js"
scripts.style: concurrently -n prettier,eslint -c blue.bold,green "npm run prettier" "npm run lint"

hooks.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run prettier
